sentences.sContent: Air not only occupies space but it also has weight.
sentences.sCn: 空气不仅占据空间，而且它还具有重量。

sentences.sContent: Her copy of 《Evangeline》 has many helpful notes at the back.
sentences.sCn: 她那本《伊万杰琳》后面有许多有用的注解。

sentences.sContent: I believe she has some influence with the headmaster -- she might persuade him.
sentences.sCn: 我相信她的话在校长面前有一些分量，她有可能说服他。

synos.tran: 有；吃（have的第三人称单数现在式）；让…作

trans.tranOther: the third person singular of the present tense of have
